    • Method Detail

      • add

        public TriggerProvider add​(@NonNull
                           @NonNull ArtObjectMeta<Trigger> triggerInformation)
        Description copied from interface: TriggerProvider
        Registers a new trigger using the provided information.

        This will call ArtObjectMeta.initialize() if the information is not initialized and will fail silently if there are any exceptions. Using TriggerProvider.add(Class) or TriggerProvider.add(Class, ArtObjectProvider) is preferred since it will handle all the dirty work for you.

        Specified by:
        add in interface TriggerProvider
        Parameters:
        triggerInformation - the information of the trigger you want to register
        Returns:
        this trigger provider

      • add

        public TriggerProvider add​(java.lang.Class<? extends Trigger> triggerClass)
        Description copied from interface: TriggerProvider
        Registers a new trigger extracting the needed information from the given class.

        This will scan the given class for any ART annotations and uses that information to register the trigger contained within that class. All methods that are not annotated will be ignored. You can also annotate the class if you only have one trigger method.

        It will not try instantiate the class or setup any listening for the trigger defined inside it.

        Specified by:
        add in interface TriggerProvider
        Parameters:
        triggerClass - the trigger class that should be used to extract the required information
        Returns:
        this trigger provider

      • add

        public <TTrigger extends Trigger> TriggerProvider add​(java.lang.Class<TTrigger> triggerClass,
                                                      ArtObjectProvider<TTrigger> supplier)
        Description copied from interface: TriggerProvider
        Registers a new trigger with the given supplier as factory.

        This will scan the given class for any ART annotations and uses that information to register the trigger contained within that class. All methods that are not annotated will be ignored. You can also annotate the class if you only have one trigger method.

        It will use the provided supplier for every instantiation of the trigger. This may happen multiple times during the livecycle of the art-framework. Make sure you implement the AutoCloseable interface if you need to release any resources.

        Specified by:
        add in interface TriggerProvider
        Type Parameters:
        TTrigger - the type of the trigger
        Parameters:
        triggerClass - the trigger class that should be used to extract the required information
        supplier - the supplier that will be used to create new instances of the trigger
        Returns:
        this trigger provider

      • register

        public void register​(TriggerContext context)
        Description copied from interface: TriggerProvider
        Registers the given TriggerContext to listen for fired trigger events.

        Nothing will happen if the provided context is already registered.

        Specified by:
        register in interface TriggerProvider
        Parameters:
        context - the trigger context that starts listening

      • unregister

        public void unregister​(TriggerContext context)
        Description copied from interface: TriggerProvider
        Unregisters the given trigger context from this provider stopping any trigger calls.

        Nothing will happen if the trigger context is not registered.

        Specified by:
        unregister in interface TriggerProvider
        Parameters:
        context - the trigger context that stops listening

      • unregisterAll

        public void unregisterAll()
        Description copied from interface: TriggerProvider
        Unregisters all currently registered trigger contexts.
        Specified by:
        unregisterAll in interface TriggerProvider

      • execute

        public <TTrigger extends Trigger> void execute​(TriggerExecution<TTrigger> execution)
        Description copied from interface: TriggerProvider
        Executes the given trigger execution calling all registered trigger context listeners for the trigger of the execution.
        Specified by:

        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:

      • addAll

        public ArtProvider addAll​(java.util.Collection<ArtObjectMeta<?>> artObjects)
        Description copied from interface: ArtProvider
        Adds all of the provided ArtObjects to the relevant ArtProvider. Make sure that ArtObjectMeta.initialized() returns true. Otherwise the registration will fail.
        Specified by:
        addAll in interface ArtProvider
        Parameters:
        artObjects - The list of ArtObjects that should be added to the provider
        Returns:
        this ArtProvider
